data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: …Spe-chan, are you okay?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Spe-chan, are you okay?

data.text:
Eh…?! Ah, I'm fine, I'm fine! 
There's nothing wrong!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Eh…?! Ah, I'm fine, I'm fine! 
<story>There's nothing wrong!

data.text:
…That aside, Sei-chan and King-chan were both really strong. 
Way stronger than they were at [Yayoi Sho]…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…That aside, Sei-chan and King-chan were both really strong. 
<story>Way stronger than they were at [Yayoi Sho]…

data.text:
On that final straight, I could catch up… I could 
pass them, that's what I believed. Since I knew 
that they were running out of stamina.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>On that final straight, I could catch up… I could 
<story>pass them, that's what I believed. Since I knew 
<story>that they were running out of stamina.

data.text: But, no matter how hard I chased I couldn't pass them…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>But, no matter how hard I chased I couldn't pass them…

data.text:
From what I saw, there wasn't any issue with the way you handled 
the race, and I don't think Spe-chan's abilities were lacking.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>From what I saw, there wasn't any issue with the way you handled 
<story>the race, and I don't think Spe-chan's abilities were lacking.

data.text:
It's just, spirit… maybe. Those two, particularly Seiun 
Sky-san's running, I could feel something awe-inspiring that I 
can't quite put in to words.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>It's just, spirit… maybe. Those two, particularly Seiun 
<story>Sky-san's running, I could feel something awe-inspiring that I 
<story>can't quite put in to words.

data.text: Spirit… you think?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Spirit… you think?

data.text:
If you can't understand that difference, 
then I'll be the one who's definitely going to win.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>If you can't understand that difference, 
<story>then I'll be the one who's definitely going to win.

data.text: The [Satsuki Sho]…I will win, without fail.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>The [Satsuki Sho]…I will win, without fail.

data.text: (Huh…?)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(Huh…?)

data.text: …Is something wrong, Spe-chan?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Is something wrong, Spe-chan?

data.text:
Before the race, Sei-chan told me. 
That our reasons for running are similar but a little different.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Before the race, Sei-chan told me. 
<story>That our reasons for running are similar but a little different.

data.text: And if I didn't understand that difference, that she would win…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>And if I didn't understand that difference, that she would win…

data.text:
Um, Suzuka-san's dream… your reason for running, is because 
you want to see the "scenery" from the front, right?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Um, Suzuka-san's dream… your reason for running, is because 
<story>you want to see the "scenery" from the front, right?

data.text: Yeah, the scenery I saw when I was small…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yeah, the scenery I saw when I was small…

data.text:
The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, 
that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, 
<story>that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.

data.text: …but, is there something weird about that?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…but, is there something weird about that?

data.text: Ah, no! I just wanted to hear it directly.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah, no! I just wanted to hear it directly.

data.text: (Suzuka-san's dream… is for her own self-satisfaction…)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(Suzuka-san's dream… is for her own self-satisfaction…)

data.text:
The reason I run, in the end, it's for my own sake. 
That's why it's a little different from Spe-chan's, I guess.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>The reason I run, in the end, it's for my own sake. 
<story>That's why it's a little different from Spe-chan's, I guess.

data.text:
(Sei-chan and Suzuka-san too, they're 
both running for their own sake…)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(Sei-chan and Suzuka-san too, they're 
<story>both running for their own sake…)

data.text:
(My dream is to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"… 
but that's a dream that was entrusted to me by my moms…)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(My dream is to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"… 
<story>but that's a dream that was entrusted to me by my moms…)

data.text:
(But what's MY dream…? 
For what reason do I run…?)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(But what's MY dream…? 
<story>For what reason do I run…?)

data.text: -Spe-chan, looks like she's taken quite a shock…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>-Spe-chan, looks like she's taken quite a shock…

data.text:
When she lost in her second race, 
she was really quick to rebound though.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>When she lost in her second race, 
<story>she was really quick to rebound though.

data.text:
When she lost in her second race, 
she was really quick to rebound though.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>When she lost in her second race, 
<story>she was really quick to rebound though.

data.text:
As I thought, it's probably because the goal she 
thought of herself, becoming a "Triple Crown 
Uma Musume", was crushed so quickly…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>As I thought, it's probably because the goal she 
<story>thought of herself, becoming a "Triple Crown 
<story>Uma Musume", was crushed so quickly…

data.text:
As I thought, it's probably because the goal she 
thought of herself, becoming a "Triple Crown 
Uma Musume", was crushed so quickly…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>As I thought, it's probably because the goal she 
<story>thought of herself, becoming a "Triple Crown 
<story>Uma Musume", was crushed so quickly…

data.text: …I get the feeling that that's not the reason though.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…I get the feeling that that's not the reason though.

data.text: What do you mean…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>What do you mean…?

data.text:
I can't really say for sure but, it's not so much the race 
results, but something more related to her feelings, I think…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I can't really say for sure but, it's not so much the race 
<story>results, but something more related to her feelings, I think…

data.text:
There seems to be something other than losing 
that has her down. For someone who was so earnestly 
chasing her dream to be so down…
data.processed:
<story>There seems to be something other than losing 
<story>that has her down. For someone who was so earnestly 
<story>chasing her dream to be so down…

data.text:
Anyways, so that Spe can keep running while looking to the 
future, I'll do my best to support her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, so that Spe can keep running while looking to the 
<story>future, I'll do my best to support her.

data.text:
I may even need everyone in Sirius to help me out. 
When that time comes, I'll need your help too, Suzuka.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I may even need everyone in Sirius to help me out. 
<story>When that time comes, I'll need your help too, Suzuka.

data.text:
I may even need everyone in Sirius to help me out. 
When that time comes, I'll need your help too, Suzuka.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I may even need everyone in Sirius to help me out. 
<story>When that time comes, I'll need your help too, Suzuka.

data.text: Yes, understood.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes, understood.

data.text: Fuu… fuu… alright, goal!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Fuu… fuu… alright, goal!

data.text: Fuu～…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Fuu～…

data.text:
That was 2400m just now, the same distance as the [Derby]. 
Spe-chan hasn't run this distance in a real race yet, right?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>That was 2400m just now, the same distance as the [Derby]. 
<story>Spe-chan hasn't run this distance in a real race yet, right?

data.text:
But you know, this distance of 2400m is more than 
just a number, it's a place where there's drama! 
Dreams! It's packed with so many… uuu…
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>But you know, this distance of 2400m is more than 
<story>just a number, it's a place where there's drama! 
<story>Dreams! It's packed with so many… uuu…

data.text: Dreams…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Dreams…

data.text:
…Um, Chikezo-san's dream was to win in the [Derby], 
and the reason you started running was to take 
hold of that dream yourself, right?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…Um, Chikezo-san's dream was to win in the [Derby], 
<story>and the reason you started running was to take 
<story>hold of that dream yourself, right?

data.text: Yeah, ever since I was little!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Yeah, ever since I was little!

data.text:
The first time I saw the [Derby] I was hooked. 
I thought, this is the race I want to enter, and definitely win!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>The first time I saw the [Derby] I was hooked. 
<story>I thought, this is the race I want to enter, and definitely win!

data.text: And like that, you grasped your dream…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>And like that, you grasped your dream…

data.text:
The reason I won the [Derby], even now I believe I won because my 
feelings for winning were stronger than anyone else's.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>The reason I won the [Derby], even now I believe I won because my 
<story>feelings for winning were stronger than anyone else's.

data.text:
The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings 
kept building up. Since I decided that I would win 
for sure, I was able to keep working hard.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings 
<story>kept building up. Since I decided that I would win 
<story>for sure, I was able to keep working hard.

data.text:
Though when it comes to studying I 
can't work hard at all! Ahahaaa!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Though when it comes to studying I 
<story>can't work hard at all! Ahahaaa!

data.text: A dream you decided on yourself…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>A dream you decided on yourself…

data.text:
For the sake of proving that I'm first 
class, I will continue to win!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>For the sake of proving that I'm first 
<story>class, I will continue to win!

data.text:
I'm running for my own sake, that's why… 
because of that, I'll definitely win.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I'm running for my own sake, that's why… 
<story>because of that, I'll definitely win.

data.text:
…Chikezo-san, McQueen-san, and Suzuka-san, everyone's running 
towards a dream that they've decided on, aren't they?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…Chikezo-san, McQueen-san, and Suzuka-san, everyone's running 
<story>towards a dream that they've decided on, aren't they?

data.text:
Hm…? Spe-chan is also running towards a dream, right? 
The dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Hm…? Spe-chan is also running towards a dream, right? 
<story>The dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text: Well, yeah… that's true but…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Well, yeah… that's true but…

data.text:
(The promise I made with mom, the dream 
of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"-)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(The promise I made with mom, the dream 
<story>of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"-)

data.text:
(I've always thought that that was my dream but, 
it feels like it's completely different from everyone else's…)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(I've always thought that that was my dream but, 
<story>it feels like it's completely different from everyone else's…)

data.text:
(Not someone else's dream, but a dream that I've decided on for 
myself… what's my reason for running…?)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(Not someone else's dream, but a dream that I've decided on for 
<story>myself… what's my reason for running…?)

data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: …Well I'll be, to think I'd be this worried.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…Well I'll be, to think I'd be this worried.
